## templit add

Add a new template

### Synopsis

A longer description

```
templit add [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string            path to the file you are trying to copy
  -h, --help                   help for add
  -n, --template-name string   assigns a name to the the file being added as a template
```
